Question.Subject: Where can i post flatmates wanted ads in auckland?
Question.Content: i need sites where i can post flatmates wanted in auckland ads for free
Question.ChosenAnswer:
hi,
As far i know, you can post flatmates wanted ads freely at myflatmate.co.nz
http://myflatmate.co.nz
and you check at myclassifieds where you can post flatmates roommates wanted ads for free. i posted one and the response was good.
http://myclassifieds.co.nz
